page.title: 16Sporting Events In Dentdale
page.content: The first sporting event of the year is the Road Race and Fun Run which are organised by the staff of Dent C.of E. Primary School, some parents and local inhabitants.Both these events take place on the same day early in March, the Road Race is just over a half marathon 14.5 miles,and runners enter from all over the country;sponsors give splended prizes like Reebok running shoes,the school gives trophies,all entrants have a certificate.The Fun Run is a Sponsored run by the school children. Apart from school sports including Football Teams and Skittle Ball,the village hold a Gala in August when adults and children, visitors and locals all enjoy testing their sporting skills against each other. There is a swimming pool in Sedbergh which we all enjoy.
